isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 9200 9300 9400 MODELS BUILT AFTER JANUARY 1, 1995 - ELECTRONIC ENGINE CONTROLS - GENERAL INFORMATION - 1991 - SERVICE TOOLS

svcproc.title: SERVICE TOOLS
svcproc.para: The main purpose of the data link connector is to allow an easy access point for electronic service tools.
Cummins and Caterpillar both have adaptor cables available for the International data link. See the specific chapter for information necessary to order interface cables and service literature.
